name: Western Heist VR
description:
Western Heist - Demo is a VR endless runner with a bit of rogue-like elements, where you play as an old western town Sheriff named Jackob, with the goal of delivering gold through a deserted land while defending it from outlaws.

It can also be used to get some quick workout by dodging upcoming UFOs and other various obstacles, at the end of each run, the player receives a report about the estimation of how many calories he burned during a session.

So put your sheriff badge on, sheath your weapon, and have a quick ride to the wild west.

*This game is under development, some sound effects and story content aren't the final status.
